Title: WPF Line of Business App
Description: Example WPF patterns for line of business applications. Includes navigation, animation, and visualization.

Project Description
Example WPF patterns for line of business applications. Includes navigation, animation, and visualization.


An experiment
This project is a playground in which to experiment with WPF. If you like it, learn from it. If you know better, let us learn from you.
